name: N.E.S.T.
description:
N.E.S.T. was built for CIS 464 at the University of Massachusetts, Dartmouth as a part of a semester project. It is a 2D platformer with a focus on story and NPC conversations.

Play as the "Traveler" as you come across this forgotten area with little inhabitants. You carry an egg with you. Without knowing much about the egg, you seek to care for it. Enlist in help from locals to secure the egg's safety. To recruit others, explore the neighboring areas and fulfill quests.

Each new member you recruit will have an affect on the color, size, texture, and hue of the egg - choose carefully.

Controls
Movement: Arrow keys
Attack: Z
Interact: X
Pause + Inventory: C
Choice: '1' or '2'

Credits:
Programming: Luke Klegraefe
Art: Devin Foxhoven
Level Design: Israel Oloyede
